thread.title: Shanghai Stocks Fall for Third Day as 50% of Market Now Halted
thread.title_full: Shanghai Stocks Fall for Third Day as 50% of Market Now Halted - Bloomberg Business

author: Bloomberg.com
title: Shanghai Stocks Fall for Third Day as 50% of Market Now Halted
text:
The Shanghai Composite Index fell for a third day as traders continued to unwind margin bets at a record pace with half of the equities market halted from trading.
The Shanghai index slid 1.7 percent to 3,448.68 at 9:31 a.m., led by energy, material and financial shares. A further 194 mainland stocks suspended trading Thursday, making it 1,439 over the past two days or 50 percent of listed companies. The government ratcheted measures to stem a bear market rout, with regulators banning major stockholders from selling stakes in listed companies, while a rising number of firms bought back their shares.
